UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET ADDRESS=?, EMAIL=?, PHONE=?, DEPT_CODE=? WHERE EMP_NO=?
UPDATE SALARY SET SALARY=? WHERE EMP_NO=?
DELETE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO=? AND EMP_NAME=?
DELETE FROM SALARY WHERE EMP_NO=? AND EMP_NAME=?
SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPT_TABLE D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_ID JOIN SALARY S ON E.EMP_NO = S.EMP_NO WHERE E.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'
SELECT DEPT_TITLE FROM DEPT_TABLE JOIN EMPLOYEE ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) WHERE EMP_NAME LIKE ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS 사원수 FROM EMPLOYEE
SELECT D.DEPT_TITLE AS "부서명", COUNT(*) AS "인원수" FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPT_TABLE D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_ID GROUP BY D.DEPT_TITLE ORDER BY "부서명"
